column4: guys how do i install flash plugin for firefox and flock? i'm on amd64 arch
goto adobe.com and download the file - let me know when u got it
already downloaded it, but didnt know how to install :(
extract it to desktop?
done
click flash_install (or installer) then click run in termanal
ok..
got a error: ERROR: Your architecture, \'x86_64\', is not supported by the Macromedia Flash Player installer.
then you need the 64-bit version
ok..looking for it
is there a version for amd64? dont seem to find it
yweah
check this out http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=1174435 much simpler.
nice :) And ya i was right tho - 32-bit firefpx needed :)
yup.
chol i got flash working...neat howto..
glad
